title: Business Proposal
overview: In disguise as her friend, Ha-ri shows up to a blind date to scare him away. But plans go awry when he turns out to be her CEO — and makes a proposal.

tv.episodeTitle: Don't try this fake relationship, try a real relationship
tv.episodeOverview: Ha-ri has a long list of facts about Tae-moo to memorize — as well as someone important to meet. Young-seo declares her independence.
